shinyjqui
  • Reference

Inject necessary js and css assets to the head of a shiny document

This function has to be called within the ui of a shiny document before the usage of other shinyjqui functions.

includeJqueryUI()

Value

A shiny head tag with necessary js and css assets.

Examples

if (interactive()) {
  library(shiny)

  shinyApp(
    ui = fluidPage(
      includeJqueryUI(),
      # other ui codes
    ),
    server = function(input, output) {
      # server codes
    }
  )
}
